name: Lost Expedition: Demons of the Past
name_original: Lost Expedition: Demons of the Past
description:
Lost Expedition: Demons of the Past - project for 2020 Epic MegaJam.

The gameplay consists of two parts - global map exploration by squads and local battles as part of a squad (third-person shooter)

Theme: "It's been a long time, but we're not done yet"
